lead_paragraph: Defender Diego Godin will be fit for Tuesday’s Champions League quarter-final first leg at Barcelona despite being ruled out of Saturday’s La Liga game against Real Betis with a thigh injury, Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone said.

headline.print_headline: Godin to Return From Injury to Face Barca, Says Simeone
headline.main: Godin to Return From Injury to Face Barca, Says Simeone

snippet: Defender Diego Godin will be fit for Tuesday’s Champions League quarter-final first leg at Barcelona despite being ruled out of Saturday’s La Liga game against Real Betis with a thigh injury, Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone said....
